summary: Adds an invisibility power that will stay in effect for 24 hours, allowing you to activate objects, and won't be deactivated unless you toggle it off.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]*** IF ANY MODDERS WANT TO USE THIS IN YOUR OWN MOD, FEEL FREE TO DO WHATEVER YOU LIKE WITH IT. ***[/size][/b]


I always enjoy playing stealth classes, but was never too happy having to use spells to disappear, so I made this mod to disappear at the tap of a button and re-appear whenever I like, without worrying about activating objects.

To find it, there's a power tome not far inside the ruins of Volskygge (there's a clue in the image). But if you're not in the mood to search, you can use the following console commands:

help "power tome"
player.additem XXXXXXXX 1

Hope you enjoy it!

[b][u]Changelog[/u][/b]
[b]Version 2.1[/b]
- Changed the name of the spell to 'Permanent Invisibility'.
[b]Version 2.0[/b]
- Complete re-write of the mod, hopefully fixing any buggy behaviour.
- Added the "camo" effect of the standard invisibility spell, so you're no longer completely invisible.
- Removed the vampiric version.

[b]Version 1.1[/b]
- The invisibility effect will now stay on permanently, i.e. it won't be deactivated when you activate any objects. Note: the vanilla visual effect seems to be hardcoded into the game, and isn't accessible, so I had to do this by just making the player character transparent - you will be completely hidden.

[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]
Just install with the mod manager, or copy the ESP file to your Data directory, and the PEX file to your Data/scripts directory.

[b]Note:[/b] If you're upgrading from an older version you should uninstall your current version first.

[b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
Credit to Brehanin2 (author of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717]Better Vampires[/url]), whose script for a similar spell gave me some good ideas about how I could improve on this mod.
author: cycle209
